The reproduce.work framework is a project by [Alex P. Miller](https://alexmiller.phd), Assistant Professor of Marketing at the USC Marshall School of Business. It is currently a proof-of-concept prototype and in alpha release. 


## Reach out

If you are interested in using the framework, contributing, or discussing its future, [please reach out directly](mailto:alex.miller@marshall.usc.edu).
